name: undesignated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not officially stated to have a particular character or purpose: She was seen smoking in an undesignated area. Every year the foundation receives around £250,000 in undesignated gifts from donors, who have not specified how they would like their money used.
More examplesFewer examplesThe undesignated balance of £70 million was transferred to various funds including school assistance funds.Several undesignated beaches failed the mandatory safety limit for sewage.The owls have moved from an area previously designated as critical habitat into undesignated habitat.
